scripts.api:start:test: yarn db:reset && yarn db:start && sleep 15 && yarn db:load:test && yarn api:start:dev
scripts.db:shell: docker-compose up -d db_shell && docker attach bb_data_services_db_shell_1
scripts.db:load:example: docker-compose up -d db_shell && docker-compose exec db_shell execute example_v0
scripts.db:load:test: docker-compose up -d db_shell && docker-compose exec db_shell execute test_data
scripts.db:reset: docker-compose down && docker volume rm bb_data_services_store
